Text: Let's see if this one works...thanks !
...and how to remove this IE 7 beta....? It show no removal, not even in the control panel....  So how to get rit of this one...? Any advise?

Installer is in German (or whatever) but IE is in English.  To remove IE 7 go to your Add/Remove Programs through the Control Panel and click the box that says 'Show Updates'.  Internet Explorer 7 Beta 2 Preview will be available for removal.

Bug found in IE 7 beta 2 causes it to crash.

http://www.pcworld.com/resource/article/0,aid,124595,pg,1,RSS,RSS,00.asp
